# joints

**Instance Property**

The collection of all of the joint update stage objects of the solver instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var joints: IKComponent.JointCollection
```

## Discussion

The order matches the order in the rig [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKRig/joints].
